SocialMediaPosting.headline: Ms. Nancy Shi’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope teachers and students will be valued for who they are, not for who society wants them to be…”

– Ms. Nancy Shi, Second Grade Educator @highlineschools @PittEducation https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/teachers-students-valued-who-they-are/
